title: Low Grade Raw and Graded T206 for Sale/Trade
author: t206trader

posts.post_title: Low Grade Raw and Graded T206 for Sale/Trade
posts.post_content:
Selling the following cards to make room for needs.  Add $2 for shipping regardless of how many are purchased.  Will let the rest of the lot go for $160 shipped or take all of the PSA cards for $120 shipped ($20 per card! 1 PSA 3, 5 PSA 2's) Paypal FF please:

Groom SC350: $30 (PSA 3)

Campbell P350: $20 (Partial double name, significant creasing from top to bottom through player)

Chase Pink Portrait P150: Sold (Not sure what happened to this card.  Appears as though glue was removed from front and back. Either way, tough card for a bargain price)

Tannehill P350-460: $9 (Paper loss on right top and right middle border)

O'Leary SC350-460 OP: $5 (Beater)

Willis Holding Bat PB: Sold (Staining throughout, several creases)

Manning P350: $25 (Slight Color Shift)

Graham P350: Sold (PSA 1.5)

Jackson P350: $22 (PSA 2)

McGlynn P350: $22 (PSA 2)

Lundgren KC P350: Sold (SGC 20)

Dorner P350: $22 (PSA 2)

Latham OM: Sold (PSA 1)

Blackburne P350: $19 (PSA 2MK)

Dineen P350: $19 (PSA 2 but significant chipping after it was graded.  Card would probably be a PSA 1 now due to additional front paper loss.)
Price Bump will let the lot go for $310 Shipped
Going to Vegas late next week and could use the cash.  Lowered for the occasion!
